subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation
description_text:
Hi,

Thanks for reaching out.
I’m using the Pro pedals from last year.


The one above.
Wouldn’t the Pro x ultra control box work in this case ?

Thank you.


On Wed, Jun 25, 2025 at 9:10 PM SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> Hi, I noticed that you purchased the upgrade kit for the Plus and the
> control box for the Pro X Ultra. May I ask what pedal you are using, if it
> is a Pro Plus pedal we will ship you the control box for the Plus X pedal
> so that one package can be shipped out for you.
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Guilherme Silva Tozzo,    If you're using a Pro pedal, you'll have the same effect with the Plus X. The extra features of the Pro X won't be used.The control box for the Pro X Ultra wasn't supposed to be sold separately, so we didn't design a packaging solution for it and it will have to be shipped separately. We will refund you the difference and send you the control box for the Plus X. Thank you for your understanding. Also, I noticed that you ordered two sets of VAM Pro, please confirm.

Hello,

Thank you for the clarification, that makes total sense. Thank you for
noticing that.


That is correct,  I ordered two sets of the VAM Pro and two control boxes,
I’m ordering for a friend as well, he also have the PRO pedal.

So please include two sets of the VAM Pro and Two Plus X control boxes.

Thank you again,
Guilherme


On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 12:19 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Guilherme Silva Tozzo,    Okay, thanks for the confirmation.

Hello Folks !

Just wondering when the order will be shipped?
Also, when should I expect to receive the control box partial refund ?

Thank you and have a great day!

On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 4:42 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Guilherme Silva Tozzo,  Sorry for the delay, I apologize for the delay, we have shipped it out for you, but I checked the logistics link and it is indeed not updated, I will look into this for you immediately. Sincere apologies!

Hi There,

Thank you for the update and sharing the tracking number.
I checked and it seems like it was shipped on June 27th but it's stuck
since then =(

I'll keep an eye out for  the your update.

Thank you,
Guilherme

Em seg., 7 de jul. de 2025 às 05:16, service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi Guilherme Silva Tozzo,
>
> Sorry for the delay, I apologize for the delay, we have shipped it out for

> guilherme.silvatozzo@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hello Folks !
>
> Just wondering when the order will be shipped?
> Also, when should I expect to receive the control box partial refund ?
>
> Thank you and have a great day!
>
> On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 4:42 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Guilherme Silva Tozzo,    Sorry for the delay, our warehouse didn't send out your package in time for you, we've changed the UPS courier for you to ship your package, and it's expected to be delivered on the 12th for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=1ZJ455510427411473

Hi Team,

Thank you for the update and for sending it on a quicker shipping method.

Just a quick question, do you know which control box was included in the
package? Was it the
Plus X ones ? If so, will the refund be processed?

Again, thank you for your help with this and all the updates !

Have a great day,
Guilherme

On Tue, Jul 8, 2025 at 8:59 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Team,

Just letting you know that I received my package Yesterday, it's installed
and everything is working as expected, I'm really happy with the purchase!
Great product.

My only remaining question is about the control box refund.

I ordered two *Pro X Ultra Pedal Control *box for $59.80
[image: Screenshot 2025-07-15 at 10.16.13 AM.png]

You corrected me and said that I actually needed the *Plus X Control Box* and
you would refund the difference, and that's what I received.
Since that control box cost *$25.90* each, I believe I should receive a
refund of *$8 USD.*

Do you know when I should expect this refund?

Thank you again,
Guilherme

Hi,

Awesome, thank you ! I can confirm I received it.

Guilherme Tozzo
